summary: A custom ENB made by tru3th, designed to give you vivid colors along with realistic lighting.
descriptionHtml:
[center][font=Times New Roman][size=6]TRU[/size][/font][color=#d8d8d8][size=5]-[/size][/color][font=Verdana][color=#6fa8dc][size=6]ENB
[/size][/color][/font]A new ENB by [color=#9fc5e8][size=3]tru3th[/size][/color][/center]
[center][url=http://imgbox.com/pogYjZzu][img]http://5.t.imgbox.com/pogYjZzu.jpg[/img][/url] [img]http://5.t.imgbox.com/0371GrJg.jpg[/img][/center][center][size=3]This is a new custom made ENB, designed to bring vibrant colors, natural lighting, and crispness to your game.I have been working steadily on this ENB for the past 2 months, and posting as it developed on both the nexus and VGU. I designed it around having bright days and beautiful nights, stormy snow, dark rain, and bright blue skies. This ENB looks best, in my opinion, with [/size][color=#6aa84f][size=4][u]vanilla forests[/u][/size][/color][size=3], but if SFO is mandatory for you, I would suggest either v.186 or the summer version.[/size][/center][center][/center]
[font=Georgia][size=5][b][u][color=#93c47d]How to Install[/color][/u][/b][/size][/font]
[size=4][color=#ff0000] 1.[/color] Download enbseries_skyrim_v0265 from [url=http://enbdev.com/mod_tesskyrim_v0265.htm]HERE[/url]
[color=#ff0000] 2.[/color] Copy the "d3d9.dll" and "enbhost.exe" to your main skyrim folder.[/size]
[size=4][color=#ff0000] 3.[/color] Download enbhelper from [url=http://www.dev-c.com/skyrim/enbhelper/]HERE[/url]
 [color=#ff0000]4.[/color] Copy the enbhelper.dll to your main skyrim folder
[/size][size=4][color=#ff0000] 5.[/color] Install the weather file (TRUweathers.esp) located in the data folder of the archive
[color=#ff0000] 6.[/color] Copy all of the files from this mod into your main game folder  
   [color=#ffff00]  In case you need help your main folder is generally located in Steam/SteamApps/common/Skyrim[/color][/size]
 [size=4][color=#ff0000]7. [/color]Download and install [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/27043/?]Enhanced Lights and FX[/url][/size]
[size=4][color=#ff0000] 8.[/color] Edit in SkyrimPrefs.ini;
[/size][size=4] 
  [Display][/size]
[size=4]  bFloatPointRenderTarget=1[/size]
[size=4]  bTreesReceiveShadows=1[/size]
[size=4]  bDrawLandShadows=1[/size]
[size=4]  bShadowsOnGrass=1
[/size][size=4]       fGamma = 0.9600
[/size]
[size=3][color=#ffff00] (if any these aren't already there just post them in)[/color]
[/size]
[center]
[url=http://imgbox.com/41TyZFNH][img]http://6.t.imgbox.com/41TyZFNH.jpg[/img][/url] [url=http://imgbox.com/jl7rSH0J][img]http://7.t.imgbox.com/jl7rSH0J.jpg[/img][/url]

[font=Georgia][color=#93c47d][size=5][b][u]Incompatible Mods:[/u][/b][/size][/color][/font]
-Any weather mod other than that which is included
(This ENB was entirely built around that weather mod
and without it the game will look entirely different)
i.e. Pure Weathers, CoT, NLA etc.

[font=Georgia][color=#93c47d][size=5][u][b]Suggested Mods:[/b][/u][/size][/color][/font]
[font=Arial][size=2][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/607/?]Skyrim 2k Textures[/url][/size][/font][font=Arial][size=2]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/59774/?]Tamriel Reloaded Grasses[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/58960/?]Tamriel Reloaded Rocks[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/24909/?]aMidianBorn textures
[/url][/size][/font][size=2][font=Arial][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/27043/?]Enhanced Lights and FX
[/url][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/41076/?]Realistic Water Two[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/5388/?]Real Ice All-in-One[/url]
[/font][/size][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/32246/?]Ultimate Lush Overhaul[/url]
[url=http://enbseries.enbdev.com/forum/viewtopic.php?t=1499]Mindflux Particle Patch[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/3288/?]Lush Trees and Grass (Use original)[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/42370/?]Unique Grasses and Groundcovers[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/1598/?]Enhanced Distant Terrain[/url]

[url=http://imgbox.com/leHCEsaH][img]http://0.t.imgbox.com/leHCEsaH.jpg[/img][/url] [url=http://imgbox.com/E31dCvG1][img]http://6.t.imgbox.com/E31dCvG1.jpg[/img][/url] 

[font=Georgia][color=#93c47d][size=5][b][u]Optional Files:
[/u][/b][/size][/color][/font][color=#ff00ff][size=3]
[/size][/color][color=#ff00ff][size=3][/size][/color][size=3][color=#6d9eeb]Vignette File/Black bars (my personal preference)[/color]
[url=http://imgbox.com/Fy153FPr][img]http://4.t.imgbox.com/Fy153FPr.jpg[/img][/url] [url=http://imgbox.com/WSUjn3cN][img]http://6.t.imgbox.com/WSUjn3cN.jpg[/img]
[/url]Without                                           With
[color=#6d9eeb]Alternate Depth of Field (a near Dof instead of bokeh)
[/color][/size][url=http://imgbox.com/LOuEzyXp][img]http://6.t.imgbox.com/LOuEzyXp.jpg[/img][/url] [url=http://imgbox.com/Gc1kQxNc][img]http://9.t.imgbox.com/Gc1kQxNc.jpg[/img]
[/url][size=3]Original                                        Alternate[/size][size=3]
[/size]
[font=Georgia][color=#93c47d][size=5][u][b]My Videos:[/b][/u][/size][/color][/font]
[youtube]C9pPmDPqRqM[/youtube][youtube]Z_k_xH185N4[/youtube]

[font=Georgia][color=#93c47d][size=5][u][b]Credits:[/b][/u][/size][/color][/font]
Thanks to tamu75 for his work on TK ENB
Thanks to Polo702 for his work on polo ENB

Thanks to Confidence-Man for his work on NLA ENB
Thanks to Boris for ENBseries[/center][center][url=http://imgbox.com/I7GrLCi6][img]http://7.t.imgbox.com/I7GrLCi6.jpg[/img][/url] [url=http://imgbox.com/iNejoB1U][img]http://0.t.imgbox.com/iNejoB1U.jpg[/img][/url] [url=http://imgbox.com/ZUSiKSZh][img]http://3.t.imgbox.com/ZUSiKSZh.jpg[/img][/url] [url=http://imgbox.com/LRqxWiDz][img]http://7.t.imgbox.com/LRqxWiDz.jpg[/img][/url] [url=http://imgbox.com/Mlp7f6US][img]http://8.t.imgbox.com/Mlp7f6US.jpg[/img][/url] [url=http://imgbox.com/Y5iKwltG][img]http://9.t.imgbox.com/Y5iKwltG.jpg[/img][/url] [url=http://imgbox.com/lPJmiVsn][img]http://0.t.imgbox.com/lPJmiVsn.jpg[/img][/url] [url=http://imgbox.com/nhBXGuaK][img]http://3.t.imgbox.com/nhBXGuaK.jpg[/img][/url] [url=http://imgbox.com/qajbkQAq][img]http://4.t.imgbox.com/qajbkQAq.jpg[/img][/url] [url=http://imgbox.com/d370rndJ][img]http://6.t.imgbox.com/d370rndJ.jpg[/img][/url] [url=http://imgbox.com/vJMKytVm][img]http://8.t.imgbox.com/vJMKytVm.jpg[/img][/url] [url=http://imgbox.com/XpmGOqCV][img]http://9.t.imgbox.com/XpmGOqCV.jpg[/img]

[/url]My current rig:
EVGA GTX 970 SC
AMD FX 8320 at 4.025 ghz
Skyrim on a Kingston SSD

FPS: 25-30 in heavy areas
35-50 in less demanding areas
(My CPU is bottlenecking and causing the minimums,
so it isn't the ENB's fault)
Roughly 60 indoors[/center][center]
[font=Georgia][color=#93c47d][size=5][u][b]My Work:[/b][/u][/size][/color][/font]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/newvegas/mods/58009/?]Overgrowth ENB for New Vegas[/url]
[url=https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCpvj3sbtI_l1c7trf9m15kQ]Youtube Channel[/url][/center]
